Text: Incredible!  Thanks for the Awesome Extras! Loved the old Whiite Tiger!

No chance of the Eclipse version of The Prowler?

Thanks for the ul!
last month Ichthypod_Crane mentioned he's working on compiling all the Eclipse series, as he did for First. hopefully he'll have their prowler comics, as i have no idea where to find those.
Do you have the old Superman Family or Tarzan Family comics?

no i don't, but you can find them all in the MTCDC torrents.

superman family #164-222 is included here: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/6782414/

tarzan family #60-66 is in: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/6821430/
